patients.name: Helen M.
patients.quote: If this trial really is going to benefit those of us living with APOE4/4, I have no problem saying that I’d wouldn’t mind being a lab mouse in their tests!

patients.name: William P.
patients.quote: While my husband had to stop taking lecanemab during his MCI stage because of side effects, reading the data from Alzheon’s research is giving me hope for our future.

patients.name: Katherine R.
patients.quote: After all the failures of different studies in the past few years for our Alzheimer’s community, honestly, I’m thrilled to read about anything that’s moving forward to a next phase.
